channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best Apple Watch (2025): Buyer’s Guide to the Series 11, SE 3, and Ultra 3
item.description: Should you splurge on the new Series 11? Or will the Watch SE 3 do? Let us help you figure out which version to get (and which to avoid).

item.title: The Hard-Left Shooters Leading a Gun Culture Revolution
item.description: Earlier this year, I attended a shooting competition for queer, often trans, very online misfits. Then Charlie Kirk was killed.

item.title: A Research Leader Behind ChatGPT’s Mental Health Work Is Leaving OpenAI
item.description: The model policy team leads core parts of AI safety research, including how ChatGPT responds to users in crisis.

item.title: 21 Best Gifts for Coffee Lovers (2025): Drips, Pours, and Shots
item.description: Fantastic ideas for the coffee snobs, at-home baristas, and commercial-grade caffeine addicts in your life.

item.title: The 5 Best Bread Makers for Homemade Loaves (2025)
item.description: From gluten-free to sourdough and beyond, swap store-bought bread for freshly baked with these convenient machines.

item.title: X’s new About This Account feature is going great
item.description: A new feature seemingly revealed many right-wing “America First” accounts are actually based outside the United States. But the data seems questionabl...

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: Searching for the robotaxi tipping point
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: AI is too risky to insure, say people whose job is insuring risk
item.description: Major insurers including AIG, Great American, and WR Berkley are asking U.S. regulators for permission to exclude AI-related liabilities from corporat...

item.title: Roblox CEO interview gets heated over child safety
item.description: Roblox CEO Dave Baszuki joined the Hard Fork podcast to discuss the gaming platform’s new age verification feature — but he seemed to get frustrated a...

item.title: Beehiiv’s CEO isn’t worried about newsletter saturation
item.description: Beehiiv's co-founder and CEO Tyler Denk spoke to TechCrunch about why the company has been expanding, and where the media business is going next.
